snippet: Sales slid to $5.2 billion from $5.8 billion.
abstract: Monsanto reports second-quarter profit of $1.42 billion, or $2.92 a share, down from $1.67 billion in period year earlier; sales slid to $5.2 billion from $5.8 billion; company attributes lower-than-expected numbers to slumping corn prices.
lead_paragraph: Sales slid to $5.2 billion from $5.8 billion.

headline.print_headline: Falling Corn Prices Bring Down Quarterly Profit at Monsanto
headline.main: Falling Corn Prices Bring Down Quarterly Profit at Monsanto
